name: Prepare payload messages
Drop bad gps
This flow subscribes to the OpenCollar mqtt stream of Chirpstack and stores them into an Influx database
Change the application #ID to the one that is used for OpenCollar sensors
This part will show all vallid incomming GPS tracks on the /wordmap UI
Add local map
Downlink composer
Encoder Settings
func:
data = {}
data['system_status_interval'] = 3

system_functions = {}
system_functions['accelerometer_enabled'] = 0
system_functions['light_enabled'] = 0
system_functions['temperature_enabled'] = 0
system_functions['humidity_enabled'] = 0
system_functions['charging_enabled'] = 1
data['system_functions'] = system_functions

lorawan_datarate_adr = {}
lorawan_datarate_adr["datarate"]=3
lorawan_datarate_adr["confirmed_uplink"]=0
lorawan_datarate_adr["adr"]=0
data['lorawan_datarate_adr'] = lorawan_datarate_adr

data['gps_periodic_interval'] =1
data['gps_triggered_interval'] =1
data['gps_triggered_threshold'] =10
data['gps_triggered_duration'] =10
data['gps_cold_fix_timeout'] =200
data['gps_hot_fix_timeout'] =60
data['gps_min_fix_time'] =5
data['gps_min_ehpe'] =50
data['gps_hot_fix_retry'] = 5
data['gps_cold_fix_retry'] =2
data['gps_fail_retry'] =0

gps_settings = {}
gps_settings['d3_fix'] = 1
gps_settings['fail_backoff'] = 0
gps_settings['hot_fix'] = 1
gps_settings['fully_resolved'] = 0

data['gps_settings'] = gps_settings
data['system_voltage_interval'] =1
data['gps_charge_min'] =0
data['system_charge_min'] =3450
data['system_charge_max'] =4000
data['system_input_charge_min'] =10000

msg.payload = data
return msg;

name: Encoder Settings
func:
data = {}
data['system_status_interval'] = msg.payload.system_status_interval

system_functions = {}
system_functions['gps_periodic'] = msg.payload.gps_periodic
system_functions['gps_triggered'] = msg.payload.gps_triggered
system_functions['gps_hot_fix'] = msg.payload.gps_hot_fix
system_functions['accelerometer_enabled'] = msg.payload.accelerometer_enabled
system_functions['light_enabled'] = msg.payload.light_enabled
system_functions['temperature_enabled'] = msg.payload.temperature_enabled
system_functions['humidity_enabled'] = msg.payload.humidity_enabled
system_functions['charging_enabled'] = msg.payload.charging_enabled
data['system_functions'] = system_functions

lorawan_datarate_adr = {}
lorawan_datarate_adr["datarate"]= msg.payload.datarate
lorawan_datarate_adr["confirmed_uplink"]= msg.payload.confirmed_uplink
lorawan_datarate_adr["adr"]= msg.payload.adr
data['lorawan_datarate_adr'] = lorawan_datarate_adr

data['gps_periodic_interval'] = msg.payload.gps_periodic_interval
data['gps_triggered_interval'] = msg.payload.gps_triggered_interval
data['gps_triggered_threshold'] = msg.payload.gps_triggered_threshold
data['gps_triggered_duration'] = msg.payload.gps_triggered_duration
data['gps_cold_fix_timeout'] = msg.payload.gps_cold_fix_timeout
data['gps_hot_fix_timeout'] = msg.payload.gps_hot_fix_timeout
data['gps_min_fix_time'] = msg.payload.gps_min_fix_time
data['gps_min_ehpe'] = msg.payload.gps_min_ehpe
data['gps_hot_fix_retry'] =  msg.payload.gps_hot_fix_retry
data['gps_cold_fix_retry'] = msg.payload.gps_cold_fix_retry
data['gps_fail_retry'] = msg.payload.gps_fail_retry

gps_settings = {}
gps_settings['d3_fix'] = msg.payload.d3_fix
gps_settings['fail_backoff'] = msg.payload.fail_backoff
gps_settings['hot_fix'] = msg.payload.hot_fix
gps_settings['fully_resolved'] = msg.payload.fully_resolved

data['gps_settings'] = gps_settings
data['system_voltage_interval'] = msg.payload.system_voltage_interval
data['gps_charge_min'] = msg.payload.gps_charge_min
data['system_charge_min'] = msg.payload.system_charge_min
data['system_charge_max'] = msg.payload.system_charge_max
data['system_input_charge_min'] = msg.payload.system_input_charge_min

msg.payload = data
return msg;

name: Downlink composer
Intitial setttings
func:
msg.payload =
{
    "system_status_interval": 30,
    //"system_functions":
        "gps_hot_fix": 1,
	    "gps_periodic": 1,
	    "gps_triggered": 1,
        "accelerometer_enabled": 1,
        "light_enabled": 0,
        "temperature_enabled": 1,
        "humidity_enabled": 1,
        "charging_enabled": 1,
    //"lorawan_datarate_adr":
        "datarate": 2,
        "confirmed_uplink": 0,
        "adr": 0,
    "gps_periodic_interval": 15,
    "gps_triggered_interval": 3,
    "gps_triggered_threshold": 10,
    "gps_triggered_duration": 10,
    "gps_cold_fix_timeout": 200,
    "gps_hot_fix_timeout": 60,
    "gps_min_fix_time": 5,
    "gps_min_ehpe": 50,
    "gps_hot_fix_retry": 5,
    "gps_cold_fix_retry": 2,
    "gps_fail_retry": 0,
    //"gps_settings":
        "d3_fix": 1,
        "fail_backoff": 0,
        "hot_fix": 1,
        "fully_resolved": 0,
    "system_voltage_interval": 30,
    "gps_charge_min": 3000,
    "system_charge_min": 3900,
    "system_charge_max": 4100,
    "system_input_charge_min": 10000
}
return msg;

name: LAST GPS ALL
func:
msg.query = "SELECT *, LAST(lat) FROM datapackets WHERE port = 1 GROUP BY *;";
return msg;
